name: interpoint
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between the points on a graph (= a picture showing how two sets of information are related): small interpoint distances a set of interpoint vectors
More examplesFewer examplesThe interpoint distances reflect similarities between the items.This method enables us to find the co-ordinates of the points whose interpoint distances are in agreement with the given similarities between the points.All of the techniques described so far assume that the matrix of interpoint distances is a symmetrical one.The set of interpoint vectors is finitely generated.
